mapper.insert: INSERT INTO partner ( user_id, reg_number, company_name, intro, intro_attachment, service_region, product_type, manager_name, manager_tel, terms_agreement, created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{regNumber}, #{companyName}, #{intro}, #{introAttachment}, #{serviceRegion}, #{productType}, #{managerName}, #{managerTel}, #{termsAgreement}, now(), #{userId}, now(), #{userId} )
